about_the_game:
The once gentle air above the ground turned harsh, people living in the under world have little faith in going out again. Attract the dwellers in the under world, see them starting a new life on this ever yielding tower.

Collect everything you need from the sky; build a skyward tower and make it flourish with infrastructure and decorations. From a small hanging settlement, to a thriving tower city.

The dwellers have gathered at the tower. Build the essential facilities to help them make a living on this tower. Use the resources to develop - build higher and higher.

When the tower goes up, the dwellers will enter different skies. The environment and scenes will change as the tower builds higher. The air is colder and thinner in higher sky, bringing you more challenges.

The logistics is crucial for survival and development. The dwellers need porters to deliver across all levels. Pipes and balloons can be used to help transport up and down, they’re much faster than porters.

The weather is no going to be tolerant. It will test the dwellers with sandstorm, blizzard and unknown forces. But it’s also a good chance to gather sand in a sandstorm. Prepare repair kits and protect your buildings from environmental damages.

Every building is a burden on the tower. The farther it is to the tower, the more pressure it gives to the body of the tower. Far buildings are vulnerable, but they can be reinforced by braces. Use braces to support the buildings and broaden your building space.
detailed_description:
Follow Us

About the Game

The once gentle air above the ground turned harsh, people living in the under world have little faith in going out again. Attract the dwellers in the under world, see them starting a new life on this ever yielding tower.

Collect everything you need from the sky; build a skyward tower and make it flourish with infrastructure and decorations. From a small hanging settlement, to a thriving tower city.

The dwellers have gathered at the tower. Build the essential facilities to help them make a living on this tower. Use the resources to develop - build higher and higher.

When the tower goes up, the dwellers will enter different skies. The environment and scenes will change as the tower builds higher. The air is colder and thinner in higher sky, bringing you more challenges.

The logistics is crucial for survival and development. The dwellers need porters to deliver across all levels. Pipes and balloons can be used to help transport up and down, they’re much faster than porters.

The weather is no going to be tolerant. It will test the dwellers with sandstorm, blizzard and unknown forces. But it’s also a good chance to gather sand in a sandstorm. Prepare repair kits and protect your buildings from environmental damages.

Every building is a burden on the tower. The farther it is to the tower, the more pressure it gives to the body of the tower. Far buildings are vulnerable, but they can be reinforced by braces. Use braces to support the buildings and broaden your building space.
name: STARIO: Haven Tower

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64bit)
  • Processor: i3-530 2.93GHZ 2-Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card, GTX 750 Ti 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: GPU must support Shader Model 5.0
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: i5 10600K 4.10GHZ 12-Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card, GTX 1060 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: GPU must support Shader Model 5.0. Display Resolution 1080p +

short_description: Build a vertical city in a world of a tower. Lead the dwellers to gather resources from the sky and build upwards. Make vertical transport and climbs up. Explore the creatures and sceneries in higher skies.
